title: Introducing: Tenterhook
content: Archie Faulks AKA Tenterhook won the Song Academy’s Young Songwriter competition last year within the 13-18 year old category. His first track, Blackfire, is “about a girl whose love possesses all the danger of fire but without the main ingredient, light”. His second tune, Stereo, delicately mixes Archie’s mature (classically-trained) voice with perfectly placed piano. Being a self-taught pianist, guitarist and drummer he most definitely has a lot more to offer in and beyond 2014…
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d09
